snippet: POMERANTZ-LEWINTER-- Nicole, on July 8, 2016, 41, of Chappaqua formerly of Scarsdale, NY. Cherished mother of to Aidan and Jackson Lewinter. Loving daughter of Michael and Sharon Pomerantz. Stepdaughter of Marci Pomerantz. Loving sister of Lara Po...
lead_paragraph: POMERANTZ-LEWINTER-- Nicole, on July 8, 2016, 41, of Chappaqua formerly of Scarsdale, NY. Cherished mother of to Aidan and Jackson Lewinter. Loving daughter of Michael and Sharon Pomerantz. Stepdaughter of Marci Pomerantz. Loving sister of Lara Pomerantz. Loving stepsister to Michaelan and Zhak Cohen. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to The Chiera Family Foundation which helps send children with cancer to camp and college. www.chiera familyfoundation.org. Funeral service is Monday, July 11, 2016 at 10am at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 21 W. Broad Street, Mt. Vernon, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  POMERANTZ, LEWINTER, NICOLE
